review.comment: Our experience was excellent. Because I had commitments during the day, they gave me an hour window to meet them.  They were highly professional and courteous.  When I noticed some drawers that were overlooked they quickly addressed the issue without any question.  I was extremely pleased!
review.review_reply: Thank you! We appreciate you being amazing to work with😊

review.comment: We are very pleased with this professional service!
review.review_reply: Thank you Mrs Grant. We appreciate your company supporting our family owned business. We look forward to providing service to your office again soon.

review.comment: Outstanding Service!!! Extremely professional and made PCS move an easy experience with combined Carpet cleaning and whole house move out cleaning. Guaranteed to be clean and meet standards for both property management company and renters. Highly Recommended!!!
review.review_reply: THank you for your review. We are glad we made your move a little easier and less stressful. We wish you and your family the very best at your next post!! Thank you for your service to our country.

review.comment: Wonderful experience overall! We scheduled a move-out cleaning for our rental house. Raylene walked me through the whole process and everything that they do for their cleaning services, and how they guarantee satisfaction in their work for you and for the property management company/landlord if you’re renting. I could tell even over the phone that she has a ton of experience and is very knowledgeable. She texted a few days before to remind me of the appointment and when they would be arriving, as well as when they were ~30 min out from arriving. We had a 2600 square foot house and they had it thoroughly cleaned and spotless including carpet cleaning in about 5 and a half hours! The house smelled and looked cleaner than it’s probably ever been as a rental. Raylene was a true pleasure to work with and they really do go above and beyond with their cleaning. I would definitely highly recommend them for any cleaning or carpet cleaning service!
review.review_reply:
Thank you, Sara! You were wonderful to work with. We will gladly come visit you at your new home anytime. Clients like you make us love our work!😊
My daughter and I completed your cleaning and, my son cleaned the carpet. We appreciate you supporting our family owned business!

review.comment: We hired Palmetto Magic Cleaning Service prior to moving into a rental house. Raylene was very communicative throughout the entire process since we hadn’t moved down to SC yet, and even sent us before and after photos! The carpets look brand new and the floors and bathrooms were sparkling! We couldn’t be happier with the outcome and plan to work with Raylene in the future!
review.review_reply: Thank you Lauren! We hope you love SC and your new home😊

review.comment:
Raylene was AMAZING, super nice and friendly, EXTREMELY knowledgeable, and professional, on time and performed the highest quality of work imaginable. We have a huge carpet in the living room. And we had all different kinds of nasty stains from dogs and baby's. She turned my carpet into a brand new fresh carpet.

MUCH BETTER service and quality then the company that came last time!
A+
If I could leave 6 stars I would!
HIGHLY RECOMMENDED!
DONT waste your time elsewhere
review.review_reply: Thank you for the kind words. I hope to see you again for your next cleaning😊

review.comment:
They are the best! The professionalism, commitment to excellence, customer care, and price cannot be beat. They have my business for life.

They took a 30 year old home and made it look, smell, and feel like a brand new home.
review.review_reply: Thank you! We look forward to seeing you again!

review.comment: Outstanding customer service and quality cleaning service. I have black injuries that are debilitating and I haven’t been able to keep up with my home cleaning, I found this service by chance and I’m so glad I did ! Mrs. Raylene went above and beyond , I got home and my home was spotless, she did jobs I didn’t ask her to and she educated me on problem areas in my home. I was so impressed I hired her for biweekly cleanings. She was so kind, professional and joyful . Book her services you won’t be disappointed!!
review.review_reply: Thank you Mrs Mack! We will see you at your next cleaning. I’m glad you enjoyed coming home to a clean home and can just relax this evening😊

review.comment: ABSOLUTELY LOVE!! I used this service for 3 bedrooms and closets and was absolutely pleased with their service. Very efficient, professional, knowledgeable, and affordable. MATT did an excellent job. He was very professional, communicated everything before starting the job and was very efficient and fast. Carpet looked amazing. Highly Recommend.
review.review_reply: Thank you Mrs McKenzie, we appreciate you calling us to come out to clean the carpet! We hope you love your new home. Please contact us for any future needs we can assist you with.

review.comment: Raylene was amazing!!!! I love supporting small businesses especially ones that do a great job!! She came quickly and on time and cleaned 4 rooms and common areas in under 2 hours!! The best thing is is that she didn’t charge an arm and a leg AND MY CARPET WASNT WET WHEN SHE FINISHED!!!! 10/10 would DEF recommend!!!!
review.review_reply: Thank you! We look forward to seeing you again in the future. I appreciate you inviting me into your home to deep clean your carpet😊

review.comment: Excellent job. Highly recommend!
review.review_reply: Thank you Theresa, we enjoyed coming to clean your upholstery for you! Call us for anything else we can help you with😊
Thank you! We hope to see you again in the future.

review.comment: We are very pleased with the results of our carpet cleaning performed by Palmetto Magic Clean & Carpet Cleaning.  They were very professional and knowledgeable.  The (2) area rugs they cleaned off-site look terrific and were cleaned and returned within 7 days.  I highly recommend their services.
review.review_reply: Thank you! We look forward to providing service to you again.

review.comment: Raylene and her team are wonderful! They have a strong attention to detail and will give special attention to anything you request.
review.review_reply: Thank you! We enjoy coming to help you with the house😊
Thank you!! We hope to see you again for future cleaning needs.

review.comment: They’ve been cleaning our house for several months.  We’ve been very happy with the job they’ve done.  We plan to continue to use them.
review.review_reply: Thank you! We enjoy coming to help you with cleaning😊

review.comment:
I’ve never had to use a cleaning service before. I like to clean and clean my way. I am unable to at the  moment b/c I have upcoming Spine surgery.
These Three ladies came and asked for a tour and any special requests first.   Then they spread out and got Right to work.
The owner; Raylene helped with the master bathrooms shower at cleaning the white caulk.
She even fixed our expensive upright vacuum!!  That was really nice of her, we thought we had broke it!!
I’ll say they were very friendly, thorough and asked at the end was there anything else we needed a few times!!
So if you need these services, Raylene and team are who you should call!
review.review_reply: Thank you! We enjoyed meeting you today. We look forward to seeing you again soon. We will keep you in our prayers for a successful surgery and quick recovery! We appreciate you inviting us in to your home to provide service.

review.comment: They did an amazing job. I will be recommending them to all my friends and family this Thanksgiving and Christmas season. What I liked MOST was they were NOT in a HURRY to get in and get out. They did a thorough job. She explained their process. Again, I HIGHLY RECOMMEND THEM.
review.review_reply: Thank you! We hope you have a wonderful holiday and we look forward to seeing you again!

review.comment: “I like the fact that the team showed up when scheduled and got the job done in the amount of time that had been agreed upon. They are very thorough and asked if there is anything else they can address that may have been missed. Friendly & professional.”
review.review_reply: Thank you Mrs Stephanie! We look forward to seeing you again soon.

review.comment: Raylene is an excellent and trusted cleaner.  She is timely and thorough - I highly recommend her services!
review.review_reply: Thank you! We love coming to help out with the house. Having amazing clients like you is what makes our job so enjoyable!
Thank you Mrs Tiffany!

review.comment: Raylene has been an amazing asset! She’s never missed a day, she’s always thorough, and to top it off she’s incredibly sweet to all of our animals. The quality of her work is great, and everything you want addressed is always taken care of. I always say that I can’t bear to think of keeping a house without Raylene. She’s on incredibly trust worthy person, and her having a house key has never once weighed on our hearts. Finding someone with integrity on top of quality is the best anyone can ask for.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your very kind review. We love coming to help out each cleaning. We love to visit the fur babies too😊

review.comment: Ms Raylene was wonderful and easy to work with. She was super responsive in all of her communication. She showed up on time, cleaned our sectional sofa, and took away our rugs for deep cleaning and pet odor removal treatment. She returned the rugs earlier than she said she would. Her pricing, for the quality of work, cannot be beat.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your review! We look forward to helping out with whatever needs you may have in the future.

review.comment: Raylene and Amanda always do a wonderful job and have been life savers for me since I'm pregnant and struggle to keep up with the house these days. My only regret is that I didn't find them sooner!
review.review_reply: Thank you for always being so kind and welcoming while we are there. We love coming to visit you and the fur kids. We can’t wait to meet the new baby soon.

Thank
You for your review! We look forward to providing service to you on the future.

review.comment: They did an amazing job cleaning our carpets and area rugs. Made them look brand new. The owner has been in the business for many years and really knows what she's doing. Her prices were very reasonable. This was the first time we have used them but from now on they will be the only carpet cleaning service we'll use. I highly recommend them to anyone needing carpets, rugs or furniture properly cleaned.
review.review_reply: Thank you, Mr Rowland! We appreciate your kind review. We look forward to seeing you in the future and we hope you enjoy your new home!

review.comment:
I had an old dog on post that ended up having a few accidents in the house but when Palmetto Magic Clean came to do my move out and carpets they did a fantastic job getting out the odor from the dog and they really got the House super clean. I wasnt charged a dime from my inspection with housing
Theyre reasonably priced, friendly, professional,always on time and they really care about doing the job right. They check their work before they leave and if its not done right they do it again.  I highly recommend using them for your move out clean! (On and off post)
review.review_reply: Thank you! We appreciate your kind review.

review.comment: Ms. Raylene came into my house and made my carpet look like new. She and her colleague were extremely respectful and delicate in handling everything and I would definitely recommend. 10/10 would hire her for more work!
review.review_reply: Thank you, Mr. Myers! We will gladly come help you and your family with any carpet cleaning you need in the future. It was a pleasure meeting you😊 thank you for your business, it means a lot to us as a small business.

review.comment: They were early and got the job done fast. Removed stains from my carpet that I never thought would come up! Will use again!
review.review_reply: Thank you! We are glad you chose us to provide carpet service to you. Please call on us again for your new home in the future! We appreciate your business😊

review.comment: Raylene is very professional a did a great job on my carpets. I would highly recommend her!
review.review_reply: Thank you!! We enjoyed working with you😊

review.comment: I had my carpets cleaned the other day they look fantastic the professionalisms is top tier the service is excellent and very reasonable priced for the service that your getting. will never use another company for my carpet or cleaning needs and you shouldn’t either. call today and set you up an appointment you won’t be sorry you did
review.review_reply: Thank you for inviting us in to clean your carpets! We appreciate your business now and in the future😊

review.comment: We had our carpets cleaned yesterday and they have never looked better more than defiantly a must if your looking for someone to clean your carpets
review.review_reply: We appreciate you inviting us into your home to clean your carpeting for you!

review.comment: Raylene does an amazing job with ANY task you give her! She can do anything and everything, ranging from basic cleaning, carpet cleaning, floor work, and more! No matter what she does to our house, she always leaves it looking ten times better than she found it. She NEVER disappoints and her prices are extremely fair!
review.review_reply: Thank you for your kind review, we enjoyed working in your home!

review.comment:
My girl Raylene.  I am so happy I found her.  She has done an awesome job for us.  She does what you ask, she is kind, on-time, accommodating, excited to make you happy and so much energy.   I would,  will and have recommended Raylene.  See ya again in 2
🙂👍
review.review_reply: I always look forward to coming to visit!!  I am so glad you chose me to clean for you and your husband😁 thank you recommending me to others.see you in 2 weeks!

review.comment: I have used Palmetto Magic Clean for almost a year now. This is the second house I've asked her to help me keep clean and presentable. I have 2 Golden  Retrievers in the house that shed a good bit so frequent cleaning is a requirement. My hardwoods and carpets are always just right after her time here. It's a wonderful thing to come home to a spotless house. And my dogs love her. I wholeheartedly recommend PMC to anyone that needs great cleaning at a reasonable price.  Michael
review.review_reply: Thank you!! I love coming to clean and visit the fur kids😊

review.comment: We love Ray! Wednesday has become my favorite day of the week because I get to come home to a sparkling clean home. It is the best money I spend each month! Highly recommend!
review.review_reply: Cleandom!!! It’s my favorite castle of the day!:)

review.comment: Palmetto Magic Clean does an amazing job. Thorough & professional.
review.review_reply: Thank you for always being so amazing with work with. I appreciate you and your husband more than you know.

review.comment: Very professional, great prices, very trustworthy and friendly. Never disappointed in their services.
review.review_reply: Thank you for your review!!

review.comment: Raylene was prompt ,curtious ,professional and did such a great job i gave 25 percent tip , I'm never calling anyone else around Columbia SC
review.review_reply: Thank you.

review.comment: Raylene, the owner of Palmetto Magic Clean has been cleaning my house for a 18 months. She is always on time and does a great job. Every time I have contacted her last minute, she has been able to accommodate my request. I trust her in my home, and would recommend her to anyone.
review.review_reply: Thank you!! I look forward to coming to clean and seeing the fur babies!

review.comment: I would definitely recommend Palmetto Magic Clean to ensure a clean home. Raylene is a trust worthy person, her pricing is reasonable and she is a cleaning perfectionist.
review.review_reply: Thank you!! It’s awesome to have amazing clients like you!

review.comment: My husband and I are running out of things to bicker about now that we have help from Raylene. She does a fantastic job- very detail oriented, friendly and trustworthy. My shower got pretty dirty while I was pregnant, but she was able to get it clean somehow--really magic ha!
review.review_reply: It’s nice to be able to give you both some extra free time!! Thank you for being amazing to work with.

review.comment: They are on time, very nice, and always do a great job! With our family's hectic schedule, it is so nice knowing we always have a clean home at the end of the day!
review.review_reply: Thank you!! I look forward to see everyone every couple of weeks.

review.comment: We have been using this service for 3-4 years now and she is amazing.  She text us the week to remind us that she is coming (like I need reminded).  I literally count down the days.  She is very thorough.  I love the week she comes because I don't have to clean at all that week.  She cleans our house every other week.  She cleans the floors on her hands and knees and the house is so fresh when I get home.  We had used other services before her and I found myself cleaning up when I got home because they just didn't do a good job.  I don't have to do that with this company.  We have 3 dogs as well and she just cleans around them.  I highly recommend this company if you are looking for someone to clean your home!!
review.review_reply: It’s so nice to be able to give you a little time to relax and spend time doing things you wouldn’t otherwise have time to do!!

review.comment: These ladies are definitely magic! They cleaned everything, even things I didn’t know could get dirty! Their prices are very affordable. I have them coming every other week to help us keep everything up. Thank you for going above and beyond for us! I highly recommend Palmetto Magic Clean to anyone who needs a good reliable and affordable cleaning company.
review.review_reply: Thank you!

review.comment:
Amazing customer service.
Soon I'll leave a review for the service!
review.review_reply: Thank you!

review.comment: Prompt, professional,  very detail oriented and super friendly. I would recommend Palmetto magic clean to anyone; they are awesome.
review.review_reply: Thank you!! We can't wait to come see you again!!
Thank you
